data.text: We urge passengers travelling to and from Cebu to avoid going to the airport unless they have confirmed flights. For those travelling up to October 28 and who wish to voluntarily postpone their flights,

2. Travel Fund
Store the amount in a virtual CEB wallet valid for six (6) months and use this to either book a new flight or pay for add-ons (example: baggage allowance, seat selection, etc.)

3. Refund
The process may take up to two (2) months from the date of request.

1. Free Rebooking
Rebook without fare difference for travel up to thirty (30) days from original flight date. The fare difference will apply if travel period is beyond thirty (30) days from the original flight date.
All affected passengers have been informed and provided with the following options through the Manage Booking portal on the Cebu Pacific website https://t.co/GAB2WonRbR :

5J 2505/2506 Manila – Cebu – Manila

DG 6504 Cebu – Manila

5J 2509 Manila – Cebu

5J 2501/2502 Manila – Cebu – Manila

5J 225/226 Cebu – Puerto Princesa – Cebu

DG 6721/6722 Cebu – Cagayan de Oro – Cebu

DG 6418 / 6419 Cebu – Iloilo – Cebu

5J 557/556 Manila – Cebu – Manila

DG 6723/6724 Cebu – Cagayan de Oro – Cebu

5J 559 /560 Manila – Cebu - Manila

October 27

Flight Number Route

5J 2510 Cebu – Manila

5J 128/129 Cebu – Incheon – Cebu

5J 597/598 Cebu – Davao – Cebu

DG 6066/6067 Cebu – Coron – Cebu

DG 6923/6924 Cebu – Butuan – Cebu

5J 140/141 Cebu – Boracay (Caticlan) - Cebu

DG 6573/6574 Cebu – Tacloban – Cebu

data.text:
Other services will operate as planned but please expect that some delays or schedule changes may happen.

Due to the bad weather and limited airport operations, the following flights from Oct 26-27 are cancelled:

October 26

Flight Number Route
DG6851/6852 Cebu – Siargao – Cebu

Aside from this, operations are limited at the Mactan Cebu International Airport with flights to and from Cebu only from 5am to 5pm.

Authorities are still clearing the runway because of a disabled aircraft of an international airline.

data.text:
Cebu Pacific Advisory #8

Cancelled flights on Oct 26-27 due to inclement weather, limited operations at Mactan Airport

October 26, 2022, 10:30AM

Cebu Pacific advises passengers that the inclement weather in Cebu is currently affecting its operations. https://t.co/DkllF2wTuw

data.text: @lance_abendan The airline, in its sole discretion, has the right to decline credit card payments to protect the interests not only of the airline but more importantly of its guests. We seek your kind understanding regarding this matter and we hope this addressed your concern. Thank you!

@lance_abendan Please understand that we utilize fraud prevention tools to detect potential fraud purchases and pursuant to the Terms and Conditions to which you have agreed to at the time of booking.
@lance_abendan Hi Lance! Tel here. Possible that your payment breached certain safety parameters on our fraud screening tool that’s why the payment was later declined by the airline.
@iveeness I'm sorry to hear this Aybs.  Can I have your case number or chat session number so I could do a follow-up?

data.text: @mgloriarn For those travelling to & from Cebu up to October 28 and wish to voluntarily postpone their flights, may avail of Ceb's flexible options: free rebooking and travel fund, up to two (2) hours before their scheduled time of departure.

@mgloriarn Hi Mikaella. Bern here. As of the moment, your flight DG6066/27OCT CEBUSU STD 1420H is still confirmed. In case of cancelation, a notification will be sent via email. For quick checking on real time status of your flight, you can use this link https://t.co/n8RpsOcAwS.

@yarralliv We are sorry if you are having a hard time to connect with our live chat agent Biyahero 🇵🇭😷. You may kindly accomplish our Guest Feedback Form thru this link https://t.co/7yR2XSIMwc and we will respond to you through the email you provided.

data.text: @yarralliv Hi Biyahero We will be glad to look into it. To further assist you and the security of your personal information, please send us a  message  via Charlie the chatbot  thru: https://t.co/zvAz6wDXJv . Or, send us a private message through: https://t.co/gNaqWVnrV6. Thanks!
@deeanvc I'm sorry to hear this CʏʙᴇʀᴘᴜɴK. Can I have your case number or chat session  number so I could do a follow-up?

@jaeyunke_ Hi linds. Bern here. Some of our domestic flights still operate as scheduled. As of the moment, your flight 5J552/28OCT CEBMNL STD 0705H is still confirmed. In case of cancelation, a notification will be sent via email. Check real time status thru https://t.co/n8RpsOcAwS.

@imkaaatth We sincerely apologize for this inconvenience 
나는 LOL. At any time after a booking has been made, we may change our schedules and/or cancel any flight where we reasonably consider this to be justified by circumstances beyond our control or for reasons of safety and security.
@roniobillos Hi Roni. Guests can update in the Manage Booking portal, provided that they are not checked-in yet.
